snippet: “The Avengers” took in about $200.3 million over the weekend, smashing the record for the biggest opening weekend of all time.
abstract: Marvel’s The Avengers, action film directed by Joss Whedon, takes in about $200.3 million at North American theaters over the weekend, in a strong start to Hollywood's summer movie season; ticket sales beat record set in summer 2011 by the movie Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 for the biggest opening weekend of all time.
lead_paragraph: “The Avengers” took in about $200.3 million over the weekend, smashing the record for the biggest opening weekend of all time.

headline.seo: ‘Marvel’s The Avengers’ Top Box Office Record

keywords.value: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 (Movie)
